{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.04986v1", "title": "Quantum control of a random transverse Ising spin system", "summary": "We consider subspace transfer within the time-dependent one-dimensional
quantum transverse Ising model, with random nearest-neighbor interactions and a
transverse field. We run numerical simulations using a variational approach and
the numerical GRAPE (gradient-ascent pulse engineering) and dCRAB (dressed
chopped random basis) quantum control algorithms.", "main_category": "quant-ph", "categories": "quant-ph", "published": "2025-04-07T12:12:09Z"}
